name: message_app
description: A full-stack **real-time chat application** built using **React**, **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, and **RabbitMQ**. This app ensures reliable message delivery — even when a user is offline — using **RabbitMQ** as a message broker.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix client && vite build --config client/vite.config.js
